name: theia-yang-extension
description: An extension for Theia connection language support for the Yang DSL
author: Project Theia

scripts.prepare: yarn run clean && yarn install:languageserver && yarn run build
scripts.download:languageserver: curl -o yang-language-server.zip http://services.typefox.io/open-source/jenkins/job/yang-lsp/job/master/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/yang-lsp/build/yang-language-server_diagram-extension_0.1.0-SNAPSHOT.zip && unzip yang-language-server.zip -d build/ && mv build/yang-language-server-0.1.0-SNAPSHOT build/yang-language-server
